caption.p: Soil properties under different fertiliser treatments. ( a) Soil pH, ( b) Alkaline nitrogen (AN)Â in soil, ( c) Available phosphorus (AP) in soil, ( d) Available potassium (AK) in soil, and ( e) Organic matter in soil. Effects of different fertiliser treatments on microbial populations: ( f) Bacteria, ( g) Fungi, and ( h) Actinomycetes. Agronomic characteristics of tobacco under different fertiliser treatments: ( i) Height, ( j) Stem diameter, and ( k) Leaf area.
